articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Jury finds Illinois landlord guilty of murder, hate crime in 2023 attack on Palestinian American boy - CNN
articles.description: A jury found an Illinois landlord guilty of murder and hate crime charges Friday for a brutal 2023 attack on a Palestinian American family that left a 6-year-old dead.
articles.content: A jury found an Illinois landlord guilty of murder and hate crime charges Friday for the brutal killing of a 6-year-old whose mother rented rooms in the mans home, an attack that spiked fears over an… [+4997 chars]

articles.author: Seth Borenstein
articles.title: Firings at US weather and oceans agency risk lives and economy, former agency heads warn - The Associated Press
articles.description: The people who once ran the federal weather and oceans agency say it touches people’s daily lives in unnoticed ways and that massive firings there could cause needless deaths and a big hit to America’s economy. The first round of firings shook the National Oc…
